hotels.title: West Hollywood Boutique Retreat Moments from the Sunset Strip with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the glitz and glamour that makes West Hollywood famous from an artfully-curated stay and offering easy access to the enclave’s greatest hits. Ease into your golden adventures with pickleball or a dip at the rooftop pool, boasting spectacular views of the Los Angeles skyline and Hollywood Hills as you soak. At sundown, gather for a handcrafted cocktail at Tonic bar, before you delve into Sunset Strip’s exciting nightlife and upscale eateries.
